title: Ping going up to 150
body: I usually have around 56 ping, which is my normal ping, but as of lately half my games I will be stuck with 150 ping. I have tried all the connection fixes on the help site, and none have worked for me. The part that leaves me most stuck is the fact that I don't have high ping on any other game when playing. I have tested it with having Overwatch open, and then League of Legends while at 150 ping, Overwatch is at a normal 58 ping. I really can't understand as to why it does this. I have tried restarting my internet, a ton of connection fixes, all of which have not worked. I should also mention my ping will juggle between 56 and 150 in some games. All help is appreciated!

replies.body: Your network could be having issues specifically keeping a strong connection with our game servers, or your ISP could even be taking a long route to reach us.  Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to obtain some logs, and attach it in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to our tech team.  We'll take a closer look with you individually to see what's up!
